alert.note: Alert for Goshen; Laramie; Platte (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 4:01PM MDT until June 29 at 5:15PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Goshen County in southeastern Wyoming... Northern Laramie County in southeastern Wyoming... Southeastern Platte County in southeastern Wyoming... * Until 515 PM MDT. * At 401 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles south of Chugwater, or 31 miles south of Wheatland, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... La Grange, Chugwater, Albin, Yoder, Huntley, Hawk Springs Campground, Whitaker, Hawk Springs Recreation Area, Meriden Rest Area, Gun Barrel, Hawk Springs and Slater. This includes Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 29 and 58. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for southeastern Wyoming. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for southeastern Wyoming.
